name: PREYSEEKER TRACKING
effect: Choose a Rifle or Nexus: It gains 'On Critical Hit: The target suffers Lock On'.
description: Semi-Sapient Targeting Mechanisms allow for powerful recursive trajectory analysis, each shot aiding the shot that comes after it.

name: INSTINCT LOCK ENHANCEMENT
effect: Choose 1 CQB or Melee Weapon. As a Quick Action, you can reroute power to the mod until the start of your next turn. During this time, you can take an additional Overwatch action that must be taken with this weapon. You can still only take 1 Overwatch per turn.
description: Extensive testing has given SAE a large data supply on the intricacies of almost every weapon a pilot might end up using. A low level subjectivity sync with a database array of the pilot’s current weapons can give a pilot an almost instinctive understanding of a weapon they’ve never wielded before, dramatically improving handling in a chaotic press.

actions.name: REROUTE POWER
actions.detail: As a Quick Action, you can reroute power to the mod until the start of your next turn. During this time, you can take an additional Overwatch action that must be taken with this weapon. You can still only take 1 Overwatch per turn.

name: MANUAL CONTROL
effect: Choose 1 Melee, Launcher or Nexus weapon: It loses Smart and you can use it even when Jammed.
description: As good as fire and forget artificial control has become, there is sometimes no beating a skilled human pilot. While it may lead to distraction during multitasking, the advantages when facing sensor jamming or deceptive holograms speak for themselves.
